trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around February 22nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile crossing the parking lot where I work, I was looking at an airplane leaving a heavy contrail when I noticed a flash of light. The flash was tiny, like a star, very high up. It faded and moved slowly over the course of several seconds. My first impression was that this was a satellite reflecting the sun. But upon further consideration, I don't think this is true. Here's why. It was moving from east to west. And it must have been very high up to be able to reflect the sun, as it was between the sun and me, so to speak. That is to say, it was between a point directly overhead and the sun in the east, in the eastern half of the sky, in the morning. I am certain that this was some sort of object because it was moving, as I stated earlier. Over the course of about five seconds, it disappeared entirely.
Summary: I saw something high up seem to flash in the sunlight before fading from sight.
